Class Tool

java.lang.Object
objects.Tools.Tool
Direct Known Subclasses:
Armor, Bow, HealthPotion, Pickaxe, Spear
public abstract class Tool extends Object

    • draw

      public abstract void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int x, int y, double angle, double scale)
      Draws the tool on the provided Graphics2D context Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object, x and y are the position to draw at, angle is the rotation angle, scale is the drawing scale Postcondition: The tool is drawn at the specified position, angle, and scale
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object to draw on
      x - the x-coordinate to draw at
      y - the y-coordinate to draw at
      angle - the rotation angle
      scale - the drawing scale
